name: Fiend
description:
See how long can you survive against the legions of hell! A Doom inspired arcade shooter, in the vein of Devil Daggers.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move, MOUSE to look around, SPACE to jump
LEFT MOUSE to shoot

Art assets are from the public domain tile-set for Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup: https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles
